messages.title: Bring Back Simon
messages.content: Local residents have been coming up to Simon Hughes in the past few weeks, urging him to run for MP again.

messages.title: Simon Hughes has always fought Brexit
messages.content: Only the Liberal Democrats are united in their fight against Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote against hard Brexit.
Simon led the campaign to save Guy's Hospital when it was under threat and fought for local health services.
Simon made sure Bermondsey and Southwark stations were built on the Jubilee Line. Now he's fighting for Old Kent Road and Bricklayer's Arms on the Bakerloo Line.
Simon helped literally tens of thousands of residents with individual problems during his 32 years as MP.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only he can beat Jeremy Corbynâ€™s Labour.

issues.brexitEurope: Only the Liberal Democrats are united in their fight against Brexit. Fighting for the rights of EU citizens. Demanding that the people have the final say on the final deal.
issues.health: Simon led the campaign to save Guy's Hospital when it was under threat and fought for local health services.

leaflet.personalStatement: Simon Hughes says he's very touched by the reaction he's been getting from local people.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fought for local area, led campaign to save Guy's Hospital, ensured the building of Bermondsey and Southwark stations on the Jubilee Line.

endorsements.endorsement: Only the Lib Dems can stop a hard Brexit.

quotes.text: Only the Lib Dems can stop a hard Brexit.

images.caption: Simon Hughes with residents and supporters
Simon Hughes's quote on Brexit and his track record
